translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and misusing personal data, and questions why this is still happening despite the importance of data privacy and security. it uses hashtags to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
